Lyric Garland
Kettering, Northamptonshire, England, UK 3rd Annual Contest organised by Kettering Rifle Band Solo cornet contest after main contest. Seven entrants: Jas Rider - Irwell Bank T Proctor - Burslem - 2nd Prize J Riley - Black Dyke T Seddon - Irwell Bank W Smith - Oldham Rifle S L Marshall - Irwell Bank T Young - Oldham Rifle - 1st Prize Reported in Northampton Herald, 11th July 1885 7 bands competed
